-e ---

𒈤 ≈ 𒐀𒐺𒋙𒋙 ≈ 𒀸𒐺𒋙𒋙 ≈ 𒀸𒐺𒁹𒁹 ≈ 𒋢 mašku mesh

𒐁 maybe in 𒀳 ≈ 𒐀𒐺𒁹 ≈ 𒐁·𒋰𒁹 𒐁 maybe in 𒈤 ≈ 𒐀𒐺𒋙𒋙 ≈ 𒐀𒐺𒋝

𒈤 = 𓃬 𒈤 MAH / MAḪᴬ to be great, exalted
𒈤 MAHA MUCH 𒈠𒄷 ma-ḫu MEGA ⇔ mighty

𒈤 MAḪᴬ 𓌳 𓄿 𓇋 𓃬 #maj maʳi 𒈤𒌨 maḫu 𓌳 𓅱 𓃬 maru mama-leone™ lion mane

𒈤 = 𓄂 in 𒈤𒊑 maḫ-ri 𓅓 𓄂 𓏏 𓏤 "before" im Vorsitz <> mayor 𓅓 𓂋 <> im ante in front

𓃮 pard ≈ proto 𓄂 𓃬 𓃭 𒈤 "before" 𒈤𒊑 maḫ-ri™ 𓅓 𓄂 𓏏 𓏤 marchée

𒈤𒄷 maḫḫu in
𒄫𒈤𒄷 kir-maḫ-ḫu
𒄫𒈤𒄷 kiln, large oven

𒆠𒈤𒄷 ki-maḫ-ḫu ⇔ kur kurgan قَبْر qabr grave ܩܰܘܪܳܐ qawro
𒆠𒈤𒄷 ki-maḫ-ḫu ⇔ 𒈤 𓄂 sphinx !
𒆠𒈤𒄷 grave, tomb

𒈛 𒈤 SUKKAL MAḪᴬ exalted vizier <> 𓄂 mayor ⇔ 𓏇 𓇋 𓅱 𓃠

𒁕𒈠𒄣 da-ma-qu to be(come) good > dimka > дика dika и ⇔ …! maat ?

follows grammatical plural:

𒄑𒃡𒎌 𒄑𒂞 𒈤𒎌 GIŠ.ÙR.MEŠ GIŠ.EREN MAḪ.MEŠ long beams of cedar (arcᵐes iran maḫᵐeš)

𒎕𒎌 #ẓabi •ẓerbi ᶻTruppeⁿ "troops" ≈ •ẓrbti 𒈤 ẓirati "forces" զորք zorkʿ <> Uralic *śoďa "war" … sotajoukko sotilaat <> soldier (influence?)
